verses.text_plain: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.
verses.verse_html: 1A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.

verses.text_plain: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.
verses.verse_html:
2The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness. ▼
▼ poureth: Heb. belcheth, or, bubbleth

footnotes.body_html: ▼ poureth: Heb. belcheth, or, bubbleth

verses.text_plain: The eyes of the Lord are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.
verses.verse_html: 3The eyes of the Lord are in every place, beholding the evil and the good.

verses.text_plain: A wholesome tongue is a tree of life: but perverseness therein is a breach in the spirit.
verses.verse_html:
4A wholesome tongue is a tree of life: but perverseness therein is a breach in the spirit. ▼
▼ A wholesome…: Heb. The healing of the tongue

footnotes.body_text: ▼ A wholesome…: Heb. The healing of the tongue
footnotes.body_html: ▼ A wholesome…: Heb. The healing of the tongue

verses.text_plain: A fool despiseth his father’s instruction: but he that regardeth reproof is prudent.
verses.verse_html: 5A fool despiseth his father’s instruction: but he that regardeth reproof is prudent.

verses.text_plain: In the house of the righteous is much treasure: but in the revenues of the wicked is trouble.
verses.verse_html: 6In the house of the righteous is much treasure: but in the revenues of the wicked is trouble.

verses.text_plain: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.
verses.verse_html: 7The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.

verses.text_plain: The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the Lord: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.
verses.verse_html: 8The sacrifice of the wicked is an abomination to the Lord: but the prayer of the upright is his delight.

verses.text_plain: The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the Lord: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.
verses.verse_html: 9The way of the wicked is an abomination unto the Lord: but he loveth him that followeth after righteousness.

verses.text_plain: Correction is grievous unto him that forsaketh the way: and he that hateth reproof shall die.
verses.verse_html:
10Correction is grievous unto him that forsaketh the way: and he that hateth reproof shall die. ▼
▼ Correction: or, Instruction

verses.text_plain: Hell and destruction are before the Lord: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?
verses.verse_html: 11Hell and destruction are before the Lord: how much more then the hearts of the children of men?

tokens.text: how much more then the hearts

verses.text_plain: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.
verses.verse_html: 12A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.

verses.text_plain: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.
verses.verse_html: 13A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.

verses.text_plain: The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.
verses.verse_html: 14The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.

verses.text_plain: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.
verses.verse_html: 15All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.

tokens.text: but he that is of a merry

verses.text_plain: Better is little with the fear of the Lord than great treasure and trouble therewith.
verses.verse_html: 16Better is little with the fear of the Lord than great treasure and trouble therewith.

verses.text_plain: Better is a dinner of herbs where love is, than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.
verses.verse_html: 17Better is a dinner of herbs where love is, than a stalled ox and hatred therewith.

verses.text_plain: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.
verses.verse_html: 18A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.

verses.text_plain: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.
verses.verse_html:
19The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain. ▼
▼ is made…: Heb. is raised up as a causey

footnotes.body_text: ▼ is made…: Heb. is raised up as a causey
footnotes.body_html: ▼ is made…: Heb. is raised up as a causey

verses.text_plain: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.
verses.verse_html: 20A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.

verses.text_plain: Folly is joy to him that is destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly.
verses.verse_html:
21Folly is joy to him that is destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly. ▼
▼ destitute…: Heb. void of heart

footnotes.body_html: ▼ destitute…: Heb. void of heart

verses.text_plain: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.
verses.verse_html: 22Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.

verses.text_plain: A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word spoken in due season, how good is it!
verses.verse_html:
23A man hath joy by the answer of his mouth: and a word spoken in due season, how good is it! ▼
▼ due…: Heb. his season

footnotes.body_html: ▼ due…: Heb. his season

verses.text_plain: The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.
verses.verse_html: 24The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.

verses.text_plain: The Lord will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.
verses.verse_html: 25The Lord will destroy the house of the proud: but he will establish the border of the widow.

verses.text_plain: The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the Lord: but the words of the pure are pleasant words.
verses.verse_html:
26The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the Lord: but the words of the pure are pleasant words. ▼
▼ pleasant…: Heb. words of pleasantness

footnotes.body_html: ▼ pleasant…: Heb. words of pleasantness

verses.text_plain: He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.
verses.verse_html: 27He that is greedy of gain troubleth his own house; but he that hateth gifts shall live.

verses.text_plain: The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.
verses.verse_html: 28The heart of the righteous studieth to answer: but the mouth of the wicked poureth out evil things.

verses.text_plain: The Lord is far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.
verses.verse_html: 29The Lord is far from the wicked: but he heareth the prayer of the righteous.

verses.text_plain: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.
verses.verse_html: 30The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.

verses.text_plain: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.
verses.verse_html: 31The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.

verses.text_plain: He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding.
verses.verse_html:
32He that refuseth instruction despiseth his own soul: but he that heareth reproof getteth understanding. ▼
▼ instruction: or, correction
 , ▼
▼ heareth: or, obeyeth
 , ▼
▼ getteth…: Heb. possesseth an heart

footnotes.body_html: ▼ getteth…: Heb. possesseth an heart

verses.text_plain: The fear of the Lord is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.
verses.verse_html: 33The fear of the Lord is the instruction of wisdom; and before honour is humility.
